vlive.korean: 편 가르기? - 젠디가 뭔지 모르지? - 젠디가 뭔데? Splitting teams? - Do you know what "Jendi" means? - What's "Jendi"? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: Splitting teams? - Do you know what "Jendi" means? - What's "Jendi"?

vlive.korean: "편 가르기 어떻게 했어?" 젠디! 형은 젠디 모르지? "How did you split teams"? "Jendi"! You don't know what "Jendi" is, right? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: "How did you split teams"? "Jendi"! You don't know what "Jendi" is, right?

vlive.korean: 수상한 사람이 있었다는 건데 왜 여자 남자 편 가르기를 하세요? They're just saying that there was a suspicious person. Why are you making this a gender issue? 듣기 View video tvN D : (소름 주의) 회사 화장실에 몰카가 있다! [좀 예민해도 괜찮아 시즌2] - EP.06
vlive.english: They're just saying that there was a suspicious person. Why are you making this a gender issue?

vlive.korean: 그럼 우리 편 가르기 게임 합시다. Then, let's do grouping game. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Underdog - 언더독 '충격의 거지꼴! 언더독 히트다히트!'
또 해? 팀 가르기를? - 장르 정해야죠, 이제. Again? - We have to pick genres. 듣기 View video TEENTOP : [REPLAY] 틴탑 6주년 기념 <엔젤이 온다> TEEN TOP 6th ANNIVERSARY
vlive.english: Again? - We have to pick genres.
